# Day 16: Choropleth

I make more Choropleth maps than anything else. This one is of the 2021 London Output Area Classification which is a geodemographic that I built with the Greater London Authority.

![](D16.jpg)

You can view an interactive version of this map [here](https://mapmaker.cdrc.ac.uk/#/london-oac), and download the data yourself [here](https://data.cdrc.ac.uk/dataset/london-oac).

Full details can be found in this paper:

Singleton, A. D., & Longley, P. A. (2024). Classifying and mapping residential structure through the London Output Area Classification. Environment and Planning B: Urban Analytics and City Science, 51(5), 1153â€“1164. <https://doi.org/10.1177/23998083241242913>
